ygData.subject: Re: Last names?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m already to the point where i can bind and I generally do it by donations when I do it.  I had one person i bound say I don t have anything but i ll pay
ygData.messageBody:
I'm already to the point where i can bind and I generally do it by
donations when I do it. I had one person i bound say "I don't have
anything but i'll pay you later you don't know how much this means..."
then ran off... bout a week later he walks up and hands me a greater
lightstone (4pp)... i've been given upto 2pp in actually money and as low
as 20cp. Seems to work pretty well though. The only bad thing about bind
is this: 100mana cost. Ouch. =)

Shads


> [SNiP]
> Or not to charge, as the case may be. I'm 10th level as well, still
> trying to decide what I'm going to do with my ability to bind at
> level 14. I can easily see myself declaring open season for 15
> minutes, binding all comers, asking only that they repay me by
> assisting others characters they encounter who may be in need. I can
> also easily see myself charging everyone 5g to bind and buying a big
> fat chainmail helmet with the proceeds...=-)
